scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && black app tests && isort app tests
scripts.format:backend:check: cd backend && black --check app tests && isort --check-only app tests
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && python3 -m alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && python3 -m alembic downgrade base && python3 -m alembic upgrade head
scripts.setup:dev: cp .env.example .env && cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env.local
scripts.setup:prod: cp backend/.env.production backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.production frontend/.env.local
scripts.setup:project: npm run setup:dev && npm run install:all
scripts.quality:frontend: npm run lint:frontend && npm run type-check:frontend && npm run format:frontend:check
scripts.quality:backend: npm run lint:backend && npm run type-check:backend && npm run format:backend:check
scripts.quality:all: npm run quality:frontend && npm run quality:backend
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint:frontend:fix && npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.deploy:check: npm run quality:all && npm run test:all
scripts.deploy:build: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run deploy:check && npm run build:prod
